title: Kara3
author: Kara3
content: The logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.The richest man on earth is earning whatever amount he is earning due to the advantage of  what he knows or  can do.So, before you can move from earning $100 dollar monthly to $1000 per month,   One of the major thing you must scale up is your knowledge.So ask yourself, what should I know that can make me ×2 my monthly income?Seek knowledge always.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Thats a wrong calculation. For the hardwork we've done, we'll be rewarded. Same as that for what we have done in a smartway we were able to reap the rewards. This doesn't mean only based on the knowledge one have got, the person gets rich or leads the regular life. Based on what you've mentioned what will you say a person who had won big jackpot and turned rich. Her doesn't have any knowledge, all that he did is just bought few tickets. So, knowledge is required to make life better, but that doesn't mean only with knowledge one can be rich.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: the world isn't as linear as that, there are many that encounter opportunity of turning around their life, having such high income out of pure luck, without even having slightest clue of what they are doing.even in business it's the same, sometimes the business just grows out of nowhere, raising the profit generated into another level of height even with the business owner having no slightest clue about whats happening.I think it's all just matter of keep trying, you just try and try all the opportunity of raising your income that arises, hoping that one of them eventually give you some big rewards.even if you don't have the knowledge, this knowledge could come along on the way, so long you keep learning new things.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: I think you're referring to earnings or profits that allow being consistent. Knowledge alone can sometimes become obsolete, people say "experience is the best teacher". From several experiences it will produce evaluations and form stronger economic instincts in all the changing conditions of life variables.And people have to believe in themselves that what they do will reap results.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Knowledge is very key to financial freedom but it is not enough, there are many people that are smart but are lazy, and you still need to covert this knowledge to actions, knowledge is like a potential energy that needs to be converted to kinetic energy through diligence. There are many people that only know one thing but through their hard work they have been able to turn their lives around and secure their financial future. Also if you are in a good company of people it helps

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Quote from: disconnectme on May 28, 2023, 04:13:55 AMKnowledge is very key to financial freedom but it is not enough, there are many people that are smart but are lazy, and you still need to covert this knowledge to actions, knowledge is like a potential energy that needs to be converted to kinetic energy through diligence. There are many people that only know one thing but through their hard work they have been able to turn their lives around and secure their financial future. Also if you are in a good company of people it helps And there are also smart people who still continue to enjoy the wealth of their parents without any hard work to make money independently. And indeed knowledge is very important but it does not guarantee one's success if one does not have experience and hard workbecause in my opinion both of them will go hand in hand with one's knowledge to be successful, and can also increase one's income because of hard work and existing experience.experience and hard work teach someone to keep trying when they fall and get back up, and this will be a lesson and when repeated experiences they already know the solution and will not fall into the same hole.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Knowledge plays a vital role in supporting one's career, business endeavors, and professional journey. However, I disagree with the notion of income limitations. It is not an absolute truth, as each individual possesses a unique correlation between their knowledge, skills, and abilities to increase their financial earnings.It is essential to recognize that numerous factors significantly influence an individual's income, including market conditions, the demand for specific skills, the extent of personal effort, the surrounding environment, and personal circumstances.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Maybe you are referring to the position that an employee where the salary were based. Since in a working industry there's a lot of work that needs specific knowledge it maybe too hard to study it may take years like doctoral or law. So when the job it's difficult then you would get paid higher than an average work where you won't need wide knowledge to get the work done. But actually you're wrong, it's true you may need knowledge to earn that much but people who risk their safety with physical work could also earn more. Let's say a cleaner of windows of a building, his salary was fixed monthly since you won't need to clean windows everyday so he might paid $1000 per month. I actually saw this where people shaming his work not knowing his monthly salary is much higher than them.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: If you want to increase your income, you must also increase your knowledge, skills and abilities so that you have the opportunity to earn more. If you're working in a company, you can learn more about what it takes so you have the opportunity to move up the ranks. And if you are opening a business, you must learn what can help your business grow even better. Knowledge can indeed help us to get something even better. So related to that, you need more knowledge to increase your monthly income.But you should know that learning will need time and when you can be patient while you learn, you will see that what you did will give you something in the future. The process will never lie.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on May 27, 2023, 10:31:45 PMThe logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.The richest man on earth is earning whatever amount he is earning due to the advantage of  what he knows or  can do.So, before you can move from earning $100 dollar monthly to $1000 per month,   One of the major thing you must scale up is your knowledge.So ask yourself, what should I know that can make me ×2 my monthly income?Seek knowledge always. Earning come from your strategies, diversification of business is what fetches more money, that's while big men who is opportune to have money always extend their money in different business form so that weekly or monthly they will be receiving a cool money as return, don't you know that one of the objectives that makes people to be poor is lack of business knowledge and also be greedy to establish or diversify business in different sectors or functions, so I believe that this is one of the elementary thing that makes people to be poor, in order to earn higher you most have a primary and secondary plan and ensure that it comes to accomplish.

comments.author: DrBeer
comments.body: It's not just a matter of knowledge. Knowledge, experience, the ability to use knowledge in practice - this gives the result. Plus - the society in which you live has a high value. Let me explain.I know one man, a fine theoretical chemist.We went to school together, graduated from different universities. Since childhood, he was fond of chemistry, I was interested in technology.He graduated with honors from the university, winner of student olympiads, one of the best graduates of his class. It would seem that there is unique knowledge, go to work, all doors are open to you.But .... he could not just find a use for himself! Industrial enterprises needed chemists of a different level, relatively speaking "more primitive", and not his level. Pharmaceutics also looked "crookedly" at the graduate. In a word, "smart uncles" took him into circulation, who decided to use his knowledge to synthesize illegal drugs!Well, let's call him "Eugene", did not have much time to do anything, as the group was covered. He was supposed to get a short but very real term in prison ... Thanks to our help, he can be pulled out without a "black mark" in his biography. Then it took almost a year to find him the right job. And in 1997, he flew to the United States under a contract to work in a company where chemists are the basis of business (for obvious reasons, I do not indicate the names)."Eugene" continued his studies there, he has a high scientific degree, he has a favorite job and family. A person does what he loves, where it is possible to fully realize it, and among adequate people who give good to the world.Therefore, knowledge, and the presence of a field of application, and the society that surrounds and guides you - all 3 components are important for success.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on May 27, 2023, 10:31:45 PMThe logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.The richest man on earth is earning whatever amount he is earning due to the advantage of  what he knows or  can do.So, before you can move from earning $100 dollar monthly to $1000 per month,   One of the major thing you must scale up is your knowledge.So ask yourself, what should I know that can make me ×2 my monthly income?Seek knowledge always. What you know will not at all times lead to an increase in your income. Some so many professors are knowledgeable in different fields, yet they are not wealthy. The ideal statement would have been the better financial knowledge you acquire and utilize, the greater your chances of becoming rich. To be rich is a product of putting your financial knowledge to work. If you have a profitable business idea and fail to put it to use, it will become obsolete. If you want to make more money, learn more about investment and business in diverse areas and take advantage of the opportunities they offer. Diversification of business is key to making more money.Most of the world's richest men might not know much about a particular business but they employ or partner with people that is knowledgeable to start and manage the business while they sponsor the venture. So riches might not only be a product of knowledge but maximizing opportunities.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Not always, my friend. Of course, knowledge is an essential factor for success in life, but it is not always like that. Some people get huge fortunes through luck or inheritance without having any knowledge. On the other hand, there are people who have great knowledge but do not have the financial capabilities to start their projects or their own business.Therefore, it can be said that knowledge is essential in life, but there are also opportunities that come before a person, and he must make good use of them.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on May 27, 2023, 10:31:45 PMThe logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.If you improve your knowledge on something that you know and still put a low price tags for your service, you are earning less. Earning more has to do more with the value you place on your service after having enough knowledge to know that you can deliver as demanded. You can earn more if you increase the value for the service you offer. You will surprised that in your field, there are some people who are earning really good amount just because they know how to place value on the products and services they offer. If you value yourself and understand the service you offer, you will demand more, and those demands will be met when a well paying client See's the value you have placed on your products and services yourself.

comments.author: CageMabok
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on May 27, 2023, 10:31:45 PMThe logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.Logically, this is so, because of the 100% achievements that have been obtained by everyone in their life, there is 80% and even less than that is the income from the knowledge they have. And the rest is from relationships and cooperation with other parties in his life so that the desired income target can be achieved properly, although it will not always be the same every month.QuoteThe richest man on earth is earning whatever amount he is earning due to the advantage of  what he knows or  can do.The richest people in this world initially also moved from very small results and even in other words there were many of them who moved from zero to success with a higher level of income. This means that they also try and learn from what they already know and always find out what they still don't know so they always make more mature considerations when they want to do new things even though it is to support more income for themselvesQuoteSo, before you can move from earning $100 dollar monthly to $1000 per month,   One of the major thing you must scale up is your knowledge.So ask yourself, what should I know that can make me ×2 my monthly income?Seek knowledge always. I quite agree with what you are suggesting, because basically it is very clear that without knowledge, anyone will not easily earn more. And even the smaller ones will also be difficult to get if he doesn't know what he should do in his life so that it can be concluded in this case that seeking knowledge is the main key to increasing income every month in our lives.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: 80% is a made-up number. You can't know or calculate how much knowledge you have. More knowledgeable a person is does not cause they will automatically earn more. That also applies to the richest person, it does not imply they are the smartest person.Beware of the confirmation bias, there are exists people who pretty much have a decent knowledge yet their life somewhat unfulfilled. Life's complex, so do not reduce it to a mere piece of knowledge, especially since you boast about the logic of life.

comments.author: flyingcarpet
comments.body: I don't understand why they do these calculations. There are millions of factors that affect such things. It doesn't make sense to me to take just one or two of these factors and make a general comment. Some people shape their lives according to these factors and question why the result is not the same. Don't waste your time on such things. The saying always seek knowledge may be true, but I do not agree much with the others.Sometimes winnings are about being in the right place at the right time.

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: If we ask ourselves about ourselves, we will find the answer to what we lack. I have no idea or knowledge about something but if I keep telling everyone to get publicity that I am very good at it and I have experience in it maybe people will believe you but how will you convince yourself that you are experienced in that. First, I have to make myself experienced. When I gain experience in a subject, I can share that experience with others. There is no alternative to developing your skills or knowledge to increase your income.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on May 27, 2023, 10:31:45 PMThe logic of life is that you can't earn more than you know,Any amount you are earning today is 80% as a limit of what you know.The richest man on earth is earning whatever amount he is earning due to the advantage of  what he knows or  can do.So, before you can move from earning $100 dollar monthly to $1000 per month,   One of the major thing you must scale up is your knowledge.So ask yourself, what should I know that can make me ×2 my monthly income?Seek knowledge always. Tell this to a mobster/criminal, who is earning millions from crimes. I'm sure that the gangsters are very smart. The richest people on earth don't care about "earning money". They own growing companies and different kinds of financial assets, which bring them dividends. Thinking about how much you get paid for your labor and knowledge is a poor person's mentality.I know about many rich people, who aren't very intelligent, but they have obtained(or inherited) lucrative assets. Just look at Donald Trump. Do you think that Trump is a genius? Hell no. He inherited his real estate business from his father Fred Trump.I've also seen many smart and well educated people, who are poor and failing in life.

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Increase your knowledge and continue with your business, as that is the only way you'll be able to grow your money faster if you succeed.It's not just about what you know, but also about how you implement that knowledge. It can be very challenging when you are already in business. Some people may be knowledgeable in theory but not in practice. Therefore, the key in life is to love what you do and do what you love. This is the best way for you to grow in your business. You will learn from your mistakes, and eventually, your business will thrive. In short, it is a step-by-step process, and there are no shortcuts unless you win the lottery.
